CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(POE_365Pass__c )),BR() & "EarthLink" & BR() & BR() & "Partner Portal User Name: " & Email & BR() & "Partner Portal Temporary Password:" & POE_365Pass__c & BR() & BR() & "AOE Order Entry User Name:" & POE_AOE_Id__c & BR() & "AOE Temporary Password:" & POE_AOE_Pass__c & BR() & BR(), '')
CustomField.label: Email Body EarthLink
